text: Gary Twigg (born 19 March 1984) is a Scottish former association footballer who played as a forward. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Shamrock Rovers *League of Ireland Premier Division (2): 2010, 2011 *Setanta Sports Cup (1): 2011 ===Individual=== *PFAI Players' Player of the Year (1): 2009 *Shamrock Rovers Player of the Year (1): 2009 *NIFL Player of the Month (1): September 2013 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Footballers from Glasgow
title: Gary Twigg
